 Unique, light and spacious apartment in Vera
This apartment offers a living space for relaxation, family life as well as socializing with friends and family. This 160 m2 apartment is located on the top floor of a typical Tbilisi style three story brick building from the 1930’s. It blends a modern layout with a classical touch. The living area, dining and kitchen are integrated which gives a large open, inviting and light feeling. The custom fitted vintage looking kitchen is generous for the cooking interested with a central cooking island and a large stove. The ceiling height is well above three meters with large double doors separating the rooms.
While an old house, the standard will give you comfort and hassle free living. A complete overhaul was done in 2006 including new heating, water and electricity system and double glass windows that keep noise away. 
The apartment has two balconies on either side of the house. The larger balcony towards the yard is a real oasis during summer nights and long dining. 
It has been well maintained by three previous diplomatic tenants. The apartment is unfurnished apart from some few items.
